name: Silent Dot
description:
The browser version is a demo, get the full game on:

  • Android
  • iOS/Mac
  • PC/Linux here on this page

Silent Dot is a minimalist puzzle game.

Move the dot in over 180 levels towards the triangle. Solve many fascinating puzzles. Easy to pick up, hard to master. A game for everyone who likes a good puzzle.

Features of Silent Dot:
✔ +180 interesting levels
✔ +180 beautiful color schemes
✔ 3 levels of difficulty
✔ Chill music
✔ Minimalist art style
✔ No ads!
✔ Play offline

Can you find the optimal route in each level?

Developed by Sander Vanhove. Follow me on Twitter: @SanderVhove.
